title: Game problems caused me to be a leaver, but the timer won't stop
body: I had to reinstall windows 7 because windows 10 constantly crashes, and my game would constantly go "Out of Range" in full screen, and even randomly in windowed whenever it decided to erase my Config notepad. So, as you can guess, I'm 10/10 frustrated with trying to play. Then, I get an out of range and can't get back into the game when i restart my PC because I'm a leaver since it's my fault the game is ridden with bugs. Now, the leaver buster timer for 5 minutes just keeps restarting. When it finishes, and I try to play, it starts at 5 fresh minutes. I reinstalled a whole new OS and the game and I still have a new 5 minute ban?

replies.body:
It sounds like your *low-priority queue* is restarting because your connection to the game platform is *poor or unstable*. This is likely caused by network settings on your PC that simply don't play nicely with League. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if this caused the issue to become resolved.
